column4: Manikpur - Bashbari Part 2 | Erosion of around 1300 mtr. had occurred w.e..f 17/06/2022 to 30/06/2022.Two (2) Nos of Relief camp opened due to the said erosion (1) Tilpukhuri ME Madrasa ,Male=179 Female=165 Child=124 Pregnant=1 Disability=1 Total=470(Latitude-26.39971 Longitude-90.753438) (2)3 no. Chapar - Tarangapur Pt-I | Erosion took place at Tarangapur Pt-I village from dated 06-07-2022 to 06-08-2022due to river Champabati under Chapar Revenue Rircle. Around 02B-02K-0L of agriculture land has been eroded so far. | 0

Tengakhat - Bamungaon | As per the report of the concerned LM on 06/08/2022 two nos of houses are affected at Bamungaon due to erosion. Terpaulin sheet have been distributed and GR items has been locally arranged. Lat- 27.302, Long- 95.343 | 7
